spi/shatter_cone_definition.documentation: Definition of the shatter cone. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors.

options.name: mass_95
options.description: Elliptical cone with minimal angles to effectively enclose 95% of the total mass of the fragments prior to their entry into the plasma

spi/shatter_cone_definition/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors. Within shatter_cone_definition container: Definition of the shatter cone.

spi/shatter_cone_definition/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors. Within shatter_cone_definition container: Definition of the shatter cone.

spi/shatter_cone_definition/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors. Within shatter_cone_definition container: Definition of the shatter cone.

spi/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors.

spi/time.documentation: Generic time. Within spi IDS: Shattered pellets injectors.
